name: Feed the Gods with your children ...
name_original: Feed the Gods with your children ...
description:
Feed the Gods !

With your children !!The gods have watched the progress of your village with a benevolent eye... so far.

If you wish to stay in their good graces, A SACRIFICE MUST BE MADE !Arrows or WASD to move your point of view. Hold mouse wheel to rotate.Left click to select your villagers and right click to send them to their chores gathering wood, rocks and food for yourself and as sacrifice to the gods.

And sometimes you will have to send a villager.Gods will challenge your devotion periodically with sacrifices. Failing to complete a sacrifice will deplete your devotion bar at the top. Should your devotion find itself empty, the Gods will effortlessly smash you like insignificant insects and play with your soul for eternity.
